sentences.en: Because of its specialty and comprehensiveness, special database is welcome especially to professional researcher.
sentences.cn: 专题数据库由于其“专”而“全”的特点而备受专业人士的欢迎.

sentences.en: But the plan's comprehensiveness is a bit of an illusion.
sentences.cn: 但该方案的全面性是一种幻觉.

sentences.en: By their comprehensiveness and amplitude these picture fille the imagination.
sentences.cn: 这些照片以其综合性和丰富而充满了想像力.

sentences.en: Comprehensiveness characterizes the most difficult problem of geographical science.
sentences.cn: 综合性是地理学最高层次的科学难点问题.

sentences.en: For the comprehensiveness of the study, the diversity of the means is required.
sentences.cn: 研究对象的综合性, 又要求研究方法的多样性.

sentences.en: I admire the comprehensiveness of Singapore's municipal facilities even more.
sentences.cn: 我更赞赏新加坡市政设施的配套完备.

sentences.en: ICD 10 is characterized by its newness, comprehensiveness and meticulousness.
sentences.cn: ICD?10的主要特点是新 、 全、细.

sentences.en: In addition, he left to the right of comprehensiveness, even Messi are second to none.
sentences.cn: 此外, 他能左能右的全面性, 甚至连梅西都无法比拟.

sentences.en: In his scholarly commitment to clarity, precision, and comprehensiveness he goes overboard in restating points with at best minute variations from at most slightly different angles.
sentences.cn: 在学术上对于清楚、准确和详尽的追求令他不厌其烦地重述自己的观点——这些从各个不同（很微小的不同）角度得出的观点基本都大同小异。

sentences.en: Individual focus include autonomy, independence, uniqueness, comprehensiveness, and other attributes.
sentences.cn: 个体维度包含自主性 、 独立性 、 独特性、全面性等属性.

sentences.en: It'said the project will'push envelope on size, indexing speed, accuracy, comprehensiveness and other dimensions.
sentences.cn: 谷歌称该项目将“扩大搜索服务的范围, 索引速度, 准确度, 全面性,以及其他指标”.

sentences.en: The basis of a leader's art gives prominence to the comprehensiveness, particularity and validity.
sentences.cn: 领导艺术的基础在于其综合性 、 特殊性和有效性.

sentences.en: The development characteristics of agricultural informationization are networking, whole - coursing, comprehensiveness and industrialization.
sentences.cn: 网络化 、 全程化 、 综合化、产业化是农业信息化的发展特征.

sentences.en: The downstream of biotechnology is the main course of biotechnology specialty comprehensiveness and practice.
sentences.cn: 生物工程下游技术是生物技术专业的主干课程,具有综合性和实践性.

sentences.en: The environmental scientific technology as a whole with comprehensiveness and to be commercial.
sentences.cn: 环境科学技术具有综合性、整体性和商品性.

sentences.en: Venture capital possesses the characteristics of high - hazard, comprehensiveness , long - term , benefit and specialization.
sentences.cn: 风险投资具有高风险性 、 综合性 、 长期性 、 权益性、专业性的特点.

sentences.en: While a tutorial provides an introduction to high-level concepts, topical guides are for those who want to dig deeper. Their main goal should be comprehensiveness.
sentences.cn: 虽然教程提供了一个高层次的概念，但是专题指南可以让感兴趣的人深入学习，内容一定要详尽。
